effects: Increase physical damage against Fairies by 50%
Increase physical damage against Insects by 50%
Increase physical damage against Plantoids by 50%
Increase physical damage against Reapers by 50%
name: Colosseum Star

競技場之星
결투장의 스타
Étoile du colisée

desc_short: Increase physical damage dealt to fairies, bugs, plantoids, and reapers
物理攻擊時提高對精靈蟲植物死靈系魔物的傷害
물리공격 시 정령, 곤충, 식물, 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량 상승
Augmente les dégâts infligés aux esprits, insectes, plantes, et morts-vivants
Mehr physischer Schaden gegen Feen, Käfer, Pflanzen und Untote.
Aumenta el daño físico contra espíritus, insectos, plantas y muertos vivientes
desc_long: Increases physical damage dealt to fairies, bugs, plantoids, and reapers.
物理攻擊時提高對精靈蟲植物死靈系魔物的傷害。
물리공격 시 정령, 곤충, 식물, 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente les dégâts infligés aux esprits, insectes, plantes, et morts-vivants.
Mehr physischer Schaden gegen Feen, Käfer, Pflanzen und Untote.
Aumenta el daño físico contra espíritus, insectos, plantas y muertos vivientes.
